work.name: GPT4SALES
work.summary: We are seeking a skilled Architect Lead and Cloud expert to design and implement cloud-based solutions, focusing on a chatbot application using OpenAI. This role will utilize technologies including NestJS, microservices, Redis, GraphQL, and RabbitMQ. Provide architectural guidance and leadership to the development team.
highlights: We are seeking a skilled Architect Lead and Cloud expert to design and implement cloud-based solutions, focusing on a chatbot application using OpenAI. This role will utilize technologies including NestJS, microservices, Redis, GraphQL, and RabbitMQ. Key Responsibilities: Design and Implement Microservices: Develop and maintain a system of 4 microservices using NestJS. Ensure scalability, reliability, and performance of the microservices architecture. API Development: Create and manage APIs using GraphQL for efficient data exchange. Caching and Data Storage: Implement Redis for caching solutions to enhance application performance. Message Brokering: Integrate RabbitMQ for efficient message brokering and communication between services. Cloud Infrastructure: Design, deploy, and manage cloud infrastructure ensuring optimal performance and cost-efficiency. Lead and Mentor: Provide architectural guidance and leadership to the development team.
